title: my game is lagged
body: in all my game the healt bare are all grey so i can't see who is on my team or when some one get a shield

replies.body: This is likely due to a bad game asset, but can be fixed!  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a force repatch to get those health bars fixed.  :D
